name: Museum of the Living Past (5ynkro)
description:
Welcome to The Museum of the Living Past, a VR game about exploring the history of ancient Native American artifacts through a firsthand interactive experience. 

Use different tools in five short minigames:

  • Atlatl & Spear
  • Stone Axe
  • Bow & Arrow
  • Fishing Basket
  • Stone Hoe

A student project from Kennesaw State University

Created by Joshua Hilliard, JaDante Hendrick, Larry Keen, Christine Murdoch, Kyle Ambrose, Adam Seidner, Noelle Stansel, Preston Brinkley, Evalynn Tam, Jonathan Zapata and Paul Burke in association with the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers - Carters Lake Project.

Zip file contains windows build and apk build.
